# Agent Bridge

> Universal converter for AI agent knowledge - Transform `.agent/` format to multiple IDE formats

## Quick Links

- Documentation: README.md
- AI Agent Guide: AGENTS.md
- Setup Guide: QUICK_CHECK.md
- Lint Setup: LINT_SETUP.md

## Core Modules

- CLI: src/agent_bridge/cli.py
- Converters: src/agent_bridge/*_conv.py
- Vault System: src/agent_bridge/vault.py
- Utilities: src/agent_bridge/utils.py

## Key Features

1. Multi-Format Support (5 IDEs)
2. Interactive TUI (Questionary)
3. Vault Management
4. MCP Integration
5. Automated Linting (Ruff)

## Quick Start

```bash
# Interactive setup
agent-bridge init

# Quick check
make setup

# Lint code
make check
```

## For AI Agents

Read `AGENTS.md` for comprehensive project understanding, architecture, and development guidelines.

## Supported IDEs

- Kiro CLI (.kiro/)
- Cursor IDE (.cursor/)
- GitHub Copilot (.github/)
- OpenCode IDE (.opencode/)
- Windsurf IDE (.windsurf/)
